name: Hollywood-Gin
description:
“Hollywood Gin Scorecard” is the ultimate scorecard for keeping your scores on multiple variations of the Hollywood Gin game.

Through parameters you change the ending match score from 300 to 100 by increments of 50, Play “Running Hollywood” where when you reach the 3rd game for each player you have the option to start another match. You have the option to send each completed game as an email to the participants. You can save a match at anytime to be resumed later. Each match is archived for viewing later, you also have the ability to remove the last play for a game if you entered a score in error.
